channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Newsmag
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Newsmag

item.title: CVE-2021-24304|2024-08-03T19:28:23.440Z -- unknown -- newsmag
item.description: The Newsmag WordPress theme before 5.0 does not sanitise the td_block_id parameter in its td_ajax_block AJAX action, leading to an unauthenticated Reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
